name: UTCS Academy For Game Development Project - Maze Racer
name_original: UTCS Academy For Game Development Project - Maze Racer
description: To play the game you have to avoid the barriers and move the square to the center where the yellow circle is while it is raining. There is a timer so you can keep track of how long it takes you. Try to play with your friends and see who can get the highest score or play multiple times to beat your own highest score!
